newsitem.title: USA: Microsoft to unveil Internet plan - NYT.
newsitem.headline: Microsoft to unveil Internet plan - NYT.

text.p: Microsoft Corp plans to unveil on Thursday a strategy to compete against its rivals like Netscape Communications Corp in providing services to Internet users, the New York Times reported.

The newspaper said in its Thursday edition that the company's strategy includes the reintroduction of the Microsoft Network computer software to access Internet and the Internet Explorer software to navigate the World Wide Web.
The strategy also involves creating information and entertainment products like television channels for the Internet, it said.
The newspaper did not give further details.
